content: tyson hat simple and classic this stockinette cap can be worn slouchy or with the brim folded up for a snug fit materials needed sizes baby toddler child adult = 14 16 18 20  one skein i love this yarn 100% circumference acrylic 355 yards/325 meters per 198 grams abbreviations  us 9 / 5 5 mm 16 circular needle  size us 9 / 5 5 mm double-pointed co = co needles k = k  darning needle for weaving in ends k2tog = k two stitches together p = p round = round gauge sts = stitches 4 sts x 5 row = 1 in stockinette ©2012 she makes hats - http //www shemakeshats com for pattern support robyn@shemakeshats com pattern for personal use only directions 2x2 ribbing using long tail method co 56 64 72 80 sts place marker to join being careful not to twist round 1 k 2 p 2 around repeat round 1 5 7 9 11 more times you should have a total of 6 8 10 12 row of ribbing hat body round 1 k all sts repeat round 1 until hat measures 6 7 8 9 from co edge shape crown switch to dpns when necessary round 1 k6 k2tog around round 2 and all even row k all sts around round 3 k5 k2tog around round 5 k4 k2tog around round 7 k3 k2tog around round 9 k2 k2tog around round 11 k1 k2tog around round 13 k2tog around finishing break yarn leaving a long tail use darning needle to thread yarn through remaining sts pull yarn tight and secure weave in all ends ©2012 she makes hats - http //www shemakeshats com for pattern support robyn@shemakeshats com pattern for personal use only
